@carpodaster

I'm more and more convinced that just looking at coaches (= users who have been assigned a coach role before) is not the the way to go. This would ignore new users to the teams app that are willing to coach but have never been a coach before. Or RGSoC Alumna. I feel like we need to consider interested_in as well.

I agree! But I'm actually also not sure that we need to know availability of people who have the 'coach' role, but are not currently interested in coaching.

@branquinhoaa I didn't test the PR yet, but I will do after you make this change covering ppl who are interested in coaching.
